Privacy Policy: 

		ConDec is committed to ensuring the privacy and security of your information when you use our application. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information in relation to the use of the App. 

1. Information We Collect: 
		• PIN and Backup Password: When you use the App, you have the option to create a PIN and backup password for security purposes. These credentials are used to access and configure the App's settings but are not linked to any personal information or user account. 

2. Use of Information: 
		• The PIN and backup password created by the user are solely used to authenticate and authorize access to the App's features and settings. 
		• We do not collect or store any personal information about users or their activities within the App. 

3. Data Security: 
		• We take appropriate measures to ensure the security of the PIN and backup password created by the user, including encryption and secure storage mechanisms. 
		• We do not have access to or store the PIN or backup password on our servers, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access or misuse. 

4. Data Sharing and Disclosure: 
		• We do not share or disclose the PIN or backup password with third parties, except as required by law or to comply with legal obligations. 

5. Children's Privacy: 
		• The App is designed to protect children from exposure to adult content, and no personal information is collected from users, including children, for any other purpose. 
		• Parents or legal guardians are responsible for installing and using the App on their children's devices and should ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations regarding children's privacy and online safety. 

6. Changes to this Privacy Policy: 
		• We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website or within the App. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates or changes.

Welcome to ConDec, your go-to parental control solution designed to help you manage and safeguard your child's digital experience right from your home. Our app provides parents with the tools needed to create a safe, secure, and balanced online environment for their children, all from the comfort of their home.


Key Features:


Home-Based Control: ConDec's primary connection is centered within your household, allowing you to manage your child's digital activities effectively from home.


URL Blocking: Easily block prohibited websites or add specific URLs to a safe list, ensuring harmful content stays out of reach.


App Management: Create a list of approved applications, restricting access to only those you deem safe. This ensures your child uses only appropriate apps.


Application Protection: Secure sensitive applications by password-protecting any apps not on the approved list. Only you, the parent, will know the password, adding an extra layer of security.


Sleep Time Restrictions: With just a tap of a button, you can activate sleep time mode.


Sensitive Content Detector: Our advanced content warning detector monitors social media platforms for inappropriate material, automatically refreshing the feed to keep your child safe.


		At ConDec, we believe in empowering parents with robust tools to create a safe and positive digital space for their children, with the main control anchored in your home. Whether you need to block harmful websites, restrict app usage, or monitor social media content, ConDec is here to support you every step of the way.


Thank you for choosing ConDec. Together, let's make the digital world a safer place for our children.
